pages.text: $(li)Chicken are small common passive creatures that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/feather)Feathers$(/l) and $(l)Raw Chicken$() upon death.$(br)$(li)They can't be tamed, but they can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat_seeds)Wheat Seeds$(/l).
While they are alive, they will drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chicken_egg)Chicken Egg$(/l) randomly.
